item.title: Why doesn't this work?!
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

I’m just trying to get this message to appear once, instead of multiple times like it does automatically.

if(fighting.getAffectedMob().getID() == 759 && fighting.getAffectedMob().getHits() == 0) { int tel = 0; while(tel <= 2) { fighting.getOwner().getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@Congratulations, you have completed the Mage Arena!"); //fighting.getOwner().teleport(496, 3399, false); tel++; } }

A for loop doesn’t work either.

Result:

:mad:
